title: Fresh berry puff pastry tart with white chocolate custard
ingredients: ['Tart', '250g frozen puff pastry, thawed', '1 egg', 'White chocolate custard', '475ml milk', '1 vanilla bean (optional)', '6 egg yolks', '75g caster sugar', '30g plain flour', '100g white chocolate chips', '2 tablespoons creme de cacao', 'Raspberry liqueur sauce', '275g frozen raspberries, thawed', '1 tablespoon Chambord (raspberry liqueur)', 'For the glaze', '175g raspberry jam', '3 tablespoons Chambord (raspberry liqueur)', 'To assemble', '300g fresh blackberries', '300g fresh blueberries', '250g fresh raspberries', '35g toasted, flaked almonds']
